title: Would someone trade their T206 Sovereign cub hofer for T206 Sovereign Zach Wheat 460?
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Would someone trade their T206 Sovereign cub hofer for T206 Sovereign Zach Wheat 460?
posts.post_content:
I am hoping to get  anyone of the following T206 Sovereign Cub hofers in low condition for my Zach Wheat Sovereign 460 that would be in fair-good condition:

Chance - red portrait
Chance - batting
Tinker - any
Evers - portrait
Evers - blue sky
Brown - portrait
Lundgren - if this even comes in a Sovereign back?

Email me for scans [url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]
